complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Project Infrastructure and Database Schema
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the infrastructure setup into Docker configuration, FastAPI initialization, database modeling, migration setup, and initial schema creation phases
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple interconnected technologies (Docker, PostgreSQL, FastAPI, Alembic) requiring proper configuration and integration. Already well-structured with 5 subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: The existing subtasks are well-structured and cover all major authentication components. Consider adding a subtask for comprehensive testing and documentation of the Auth0 integration workflow.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to Auth0 integration, multi-account support, and security considerations. The existing 4 subtasks are appropriate and well-defined.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop LLM Integration for Receipt Processing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) LLM client configuration and provider abstraction, 2) Receipt parsing prompt engineering and validation, 3) Error handling and retry logic implementation, 4) Response validation and data structure mapping, 5) Performance optimization and caching strategies.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving AI integration, multiple LLM providers, and complex data extraction logic requiring specialized prompt engineering.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Receipt Upload and Image Processing Pipeline
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: 1) File upload API endpoints with validation, 2) Image preprocessing and quality enhancement, 3) Object storage integration and management, 4) User association and security implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity involving file handling, image processing, storage systems, and security considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: 1) Processing pipeline orchestration, 2) LLM integration and data extraction, 3) Data validation and error handling, 4) Database storage and user association, 5) Status tracking and monitoring system.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity as it integrates multiple systems and requires robust error handling and data validation across the entire processing pipeline.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Basic Frontend Receipt Upload Interface
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: 1) Auth0 frontend integration and authentication flow, 2) File upload interface with drag-and-drop and camera capture, 3) Receipt preview and confirmation screens, 4) Processing status tracking and real-time updates, 5) Mobile-responsive design and user account management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to Auth0 integration, mobile-first design, camera functionality, and real-time status updates.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Basic Analytics and Dashboard Backend
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Analytics API endpoints for spending summaries, 2) Database query optimization and indexing, 3) Caching implementation for performance, 4) User authorization and data filtering.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity involving database optimization, caching strategies, and user-specific data access controls.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: 1) Chart library integration and visualization components, 2) Dashboard layout and responsive design, 3) Data filtering and search functionality, 4) User account management and switching interface.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity requiring data visualization expertise, responsive design, and integration with backend analytics.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: 1) Excel export API with openpyxl integration, 2) Date range filtering and data aggregation, 3) Download functionality and file management with user authorization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity involving Excel library integration and file handling, but relatively straightforward compared to other tasks.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Receipt Verification and Manual Override System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: 1) Validation logic for AI parsing accuracy, 2) Manual editing interface for corrections, 3) Approval workflow and bulk operations, 4) Data integrity checks and user authorization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring sophisticated validation logic, user interface design for editing, and data integrity management.
